casebody.data:
LILLIE
v.
CARVER 421P10-6 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 17, 2017 Ms. Anne M. Middleton, Special Deputy Attorney General, Mr. Patrick Nadolski, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Mr. Robert Alan Lillie, for Lillie, Robert Alan.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th of July 2017 by Petitioner for Judgment on the Pleading:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of August 2017."
